attributes.description: The Suzuki Jimny comes standard with a 2 year / 30 000 km Service Plan (GA) or 4  year / 60 000 km Service Plan (GL and GLX) and a 5 year / 200 000 km Promotional Warranty. For the best Suzuki experience, your Suzuki Jimny must be serviced once every twelve months or every 15 000 km, whichever comes first.

Like its predecessors, the new Suzuki Jimny remains a small, lightweight 4WD (four-wheel drive) car. Its lightweight keeps it going strong over mud, through sand, and up steep slippery slopes where heavier 4X4s tend to get stuck.
